Neural Network (Model)¶

EpyNN Class Object¶

class nnlibs.meta.models.EpyNN(layers, name='Network')[source]¶

Definition of a Neural Network prototype following the EpyNN scheme.

Parameters

  • layers (list[Object]) – Network architecture

  • name (str, optional) – Name of network, defaults to ‘Network’

__init__(layers, name='Network')[source]¶

Initialize instance variable attributes.

Variables

  • layers (list[Object]) – Network architecture

  • embedding (nnlibs.embedding.models.Embedding) – Embedding layer

  • ts (int) – Timestamp identifier

  • uname (str) – Network unique identifier

  • initialized (bool) – Model initialization state

forward(X)[source]¶

Wrapper for nnlibs.meta.forward.model_forward().

Parameters

X (numpy.ndarray) – Set of sample features.

Returns

Output of forward propagation through all layers in the Network.

Return type

numpy.ndarray

def model_forward(model, X):
    """Forward propagate input data from input to output layer.
    """
    A = X

    for layer in model.layers:

        layer.e = model.e

        A = layer.forward(A)

    return A    # To derivative of ...
backward(dA)[source]¶

Wrapper for nnlibs.meta.backward.model_backward().

Parameters

dA (numpy.ndarray) – Derivative of ….

Returns

Output of forward propagation through all layers in the Network.

Return type

numpy.ndarray

def model_backward(model, dA):
    """Backward propagate error from output to input layer.
    """
    for layer in reversed(model.layers):

        dA = layer.backward(dA)

        layer.compute_gradients()
        layer.update_parameters()

    return None

predict(X_data, X_encode=False)[source]¶

Perform prediction of label from unlabeled samples in dataset.

Parameters

  • X_encode (bool) – One-hot encode sample features.

Returns

Data embedding and output of forward propagation

Return type

nnlibs.commons.models.dataSet

Hyperparameters¶

nnlibs.settings.se_hPars¶
se_hPars = {
    # Schedule learning rate
    'learning_rate': 0.1,
    'schedule_mode': 'steady',
    'decay_k': 0.001,
    'cycling_n': 1,
    'descent_d': 1,
    # Tune activation function
    'ELU_alpha': 0.01,
    'LRELU_alpha': 0.01,
    'softmax_temperature': 1,
}
"""Hyperparameters dictionary settings.

Set hyperparameters for model and layer.
"""
